title: How long until wars are fought exclusively with remotely operated 'robots' and drones? - Quora

response.answer_text: I thinking that will never happen. Reason: such a war would boil down to who could make the most robots and keep producing them until the enemy’s ability to destroy them was exhausted. Total cost of goods produced? Astronomical and more than even the heaviest taxation can support. Life is much cheaper and it’s self reproducing so long as you give it food and shelter.
